body:
PR description:

Correction to silicon rotated module for correct cassette implementation and layer type changes
Depends on external: #38040, #38032 
Please test with externals 

PR validation:

Tested using overlap checking tool g4OverlapCheckLayer_cfg.py,a nd using fireworks.

if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Correction to silicon rotated module for correct cassette implementation
